sen.e: In June, Keio 3 (Japanese calendar), Goryo-eji became under the command of Tadayuki TODA who was Sanryo bugyo (commissioner in charge of imperial mausoleums), moved from Choen-ji Temple to Kodai-ji Temple and Gesshin-in Temple, and set up the nameplate reading Kinri Goryo Eji (a splinter group of the Shinsengumi) there.
